Articles.Content: Hi I've been playing ksp for a while now and I've wanted to create some mods although I have no source for inspiration. I lots have modding experience and I've been using 3ds max and photoshop for over 2 years now. If anybody needs a modeler/texturer for their mod project I'd be happy to help.
Check out kevinlacht's project and send him a message, he/we need a texturer for the Kontellation project. Thanks in advance! Also send me a message for inspiration!
Might be counted as necroing, but welcome to the team!
You cant necro a thread thats less than a day old.
This was the same problem with me

This was the same problem with me

What exactly was the problem?

I could model and create parts but after i finished and perfected the hole modeling thing, I could never know what to make. I really wanted to dive into a large project and make it and be respected as a moder.

I could model and create parts but after i finished and perfected the hole modeling thing, I could never know what to make. I really wanted to dive into a large project and make it and be respected as a moder.

For me, all of my ideas come from something that is missing in the game. Reproductions of real-world complicated projects always inspire me!
You could do the Red Bull Stratos, just for fun. It seems that the toys get pretty good use these days.
I was going to shoot for a Complex probe system with lots of parts and maybe a launcher. since your here what do you think of that idea?
I could use a 3D artist for different projects I would like to start (ex a rover/probe pack) also some pictures of something simple like a fuel tank would help show how good you are
Very much a WIP but its my probe sized NERVA.
Thats why i named my probe department of my company to Bentley probes

Guys- contact Majiir and the team working on the Kethane lab- make some engine parts that are sugested in the comments. I wanted to build an interplanetary ramscoop, but I can neither model nor code. See if they want anything modeled.
